description:
From family hikes to mountain bikes and everything in between. This water bottle packs multiple layers of insulation into a lightweight, flexible bottle to deliver thirst-quenching cool water when you need it. The self-sealing valve ensures you don't lose any precious cold liquid.

  • Triple-layered insulation keeps your water cooler for longer
  • Finger grooves and ultra-light material for extra grip and easy squeeze
  • Spill-proof nozzle is self-sealing to prevent leaks
  • Removeable valve system is easy to clean and prevents grunge buildup
name: Polar Bottle Kids Insulated 355ml Water Bottle
